effect.sword-shield: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
effect.the-crown-tundra: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
effect.legends-arceus: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.

short_effect.sword-shield: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
short_effect.the-isle-of-armor: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
short_effect.the-crown-tundra: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
short_effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
short_effect.legends-arceus: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if there is any able to battle. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.
